name: Breathe
description: '''Breathe''' were an English pop band formed in London in 1984. The band enjoyed chart success in the late 1980s and early 1990s with hit singles "[[Don't Tell Me Lies]]", "[[How Can I Fall?]]", and "[[Say a Prayer (Breathe song)|Say a Prayer]]". The group's biggest hit was "[[Hands to Heaven]]", which reached #2 in the United States in August 1988.
